102-256b @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ /Ar+ya bai shA lI pra be sha ma hA sU traM/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa yangs pa'i grong khyer du

513
102-257a 'jug pa'i mdo chen po/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dam bu'i khrod na gzings ba'i 'dug gnas na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo yangs pa'i grong khyer ga la ba der 'dod do/ /btsun pa de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das yul br-i dzor yul rgyu zhing gshegs te/ yangs ba'i grong khyer du byon nas yangs pa'i grong khyer gyi a mra srung ba'i tshal na bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo yangs ba'i grong khyer du song la phyin nas/ sgo'i them pa la rkang pa zhog ste/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smros shig /bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsams pa/ dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ slob pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ nyan thos thams cad kyis bsams pa/ bden pa'i tshig dang ldan pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ chos kyis bsams pa/ tshangs pas bsams pa/ tshangs pa so sos bsams pa/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis bsams pa/ dbang pos bsams pa/ lhas bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi mngag gzhug pas bsams pa/ 'byung po thams cad kyis bsams pa/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to/ /mu ny+tsa ta/ muny+tsa ta/

514
102-257b ma 'dug shig /yams kyi nad rnams zhi bar gyur cig /ni rgats+tsha ta/ ni rgats+tsha ta/ ni rgats+tsha ta/ ni rgats+tsha ta/ sangs rgyas lha chen po lha'i lha/ lha'i bla ma gshegs shing / dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag kyang 'ong / lha 'bum phrag du ma dag dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang / lha ma yin 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang 'ong / bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad pa'i 'byung po 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir 'ongs te/ de dag khyed rnams la gnod pa chen po byed par 'gyur du 'ong gis/ ni rgats+tsha ta/ ni rgats+tsha ta/ ni rgats+tsha ta/ ni rgats+tsha ta/ myur du byer cig /khyed cag las gang dag sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag ni phung bar gyur cig /gang dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / nyes pa mi 'dod la srung bar 'jug par 'dod pa de dag ni 'khod cig /lus la yang 'jug par gyis shig /sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal pa/ su mu su mu/ su mu su mu/ su mu/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mu rU ri ti/ ri ri ri ri ri ri/ rI rI rI rI rI rI/ ti mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri ti/ ha si mi ri/ mI rI taM/ mi ti/ si sI si mI/ kang+ka ra/ ka ra ka ta/ kang+ka rA/ kang+ka tsa/ kang+ka rA/ ka da rA/ kang+ka rA/ kang+ka rA/ kang+ka rA/ kang+ka rA/ kang+ka rA/

515
102-258a kang+ka rA/ kang+ka rA/ kang+ka rA/ kang+ka rA/ kang+ka rA/ kang+ka ro tI ti/ ku ri/ sho kang+ka ra/ kang+ka ri shi/ ri ri ri ri ri ri/ ti ri te phu swA/ ri phu ri phu/ ri phu ri phu/ ri phu ri phu/ ri phu/ nA thA nA nA thA tha/ ri pu ri pu/ nA thA tha/ / ni rgats+tsha ta/ ri bu ri bu/ nirga ts+tsha ta/ pa yA tha/ ri bU ri pU/ pa lA ya ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can/ sems can thams cad la phan par lhag par dgongs pa dang ldan pa/ byams pa la gnas pa/ thugs rje dang ldan pa/ dga' ba la gnas pa/ btang snyoms la gnas pa gshegs kyis k+Shi phran ni rga ts+tsha ta swA hA/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi mchog dang / chos nyid kyis lha thams cad dang / 'byung po thams cad la bka' stsal pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni grub pa'o/ /tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag ni grub pa'o/ /gang la ser sna rnam chags pa/ /rnam 'joms dri ma med mdzad cing / /thugs zhi gnod pa mi mnga' des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams/ /thar ba'i lam du 'dzud mdzad cing / /chos rnams thams cad ston pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /ston pa rgyug pa rnams kyi rten/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /gang gis bde ba mnga' mdzad de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /skyob pa gang zhig byams pa yi/ /thugs kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun/ /bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs te/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba yi/ /sems can kun gyi rten gyur cing / /gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur/ /gtsang zhing slu ba mi mnga' la/ /gsung gtsor gtsang mar mdzad pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /dpa' bo chen po gang skyes pa/ /phun

516
102-258b sum tshogs don 'byor gyur cing / /don grub tshogs kyang grub pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig skyes bas sa rnams ni/ /nags tshal bcas pa rab g.yos shing / /sems can thams cad rab dga' de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /byang chub snying por gang zhig gis/ /sa dag rnam drug g.yos gyur cing / /bdud yid mi bder gyur pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnam gsung ba/ / thub pa'i snyan pa gang byung de/ /khyed la bde legs byed par 'gyur/ /yid 'phrog gang gis mu stegs byed/ /thams cad chos kyis pham mdzad cing / /tshogs kun dbang du mdzad pa de/ /khyod la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas khyed la bde legs mdzad/ /brgya byin lha bcas bde legs dang / /'byung po kun gyi bde legs ni/ /khyed la rtag tu sbyin gyur cig /sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang / /lha rnams kyis ni bsams pa yis/ /khyed rnams don 'dod gang yin pa/ /don de de ring grub gyur cig /rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog /rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog /khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs shog /phyir 'ong dag kyang bde legs shog /nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs/ / nyi ma'i gung la'ang bde legs shog /khyed cag kun tu bde legs shog /khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig /sangs rgyas lha rnams stong dag gis/ /yongs su bskor te gshegs mdzad kyis/ /sdang sems ldan pa rnams byer cig /snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khod/ /sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / /dgra bcom slob pa'i bden tshig gis/ /'jig rten mi phan byed pa rnams/ /grong khyer 'dir ni gtong gyur cig /sems can kun dang srog chags kun/ /'byung po kun dang khyed cag kun/ /

517
102-259a bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig /thams cad nad rnams med par shog /kun gyis bzang rnams mthong gyur cig /gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig /'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur cing / /sa dang bar snang dag la gnas pa rnams/ /skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog /nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig /de skad bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas yangs pa'i grong khyer du song ste/ sgo'i them pa la rkang pa bzhag nas gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so/ /bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to/ / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsams pa/ dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ slob pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ nyan thos thams cad kyis bsams pa/ bden pa'i tshig dang ldan pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ chos kyis bsams pa/ tshangs pas bsams pa/ tshangs pa so sos bsams pa/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis bsams pa/ dbang pos bsams pa/ lhas bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bsams pa/ lha ma yin thams cad kyis bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi mngag gzhug pas bsams pa/ 'byung po thams cad kyis bsams pa/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to/ /muny+tsa ta/ muny+tsa ta/ ma 'dug shig /yams kyi nad zhi bar gyur cig /ni rgats+tsha ta/ nirga ts+tsha ta/ nirga ts+tsha ta/ nirga ts+tsha ta/ sangs rgyas lha chen po lha'i yang lha/ lha'i bla ma gshegs shing / dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / dbang bdag dang

518
102-259b bcas pa rnams dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag kyang 'ong / lha stong phrag du ma dag dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang / lha ma yin stong phrag du ma dag kyang 'ong / bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad pa'i 'byung po brgya stong mang po dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir 'ongs te/ de dag khyed la gnod pa chen po byed par 'gyur gyis/ nirgats+tsha ta/ ni rgats+tsha ta/ ni rgats+tsha ta/ ni rgats+tsha ta/ myur du byer cig /khyed cag las gang dag sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag ni phung bar gyur cig /gang dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing nyes par mi 'dod la srung bar 'jug par 'dod pa de dag ni 'khod cig /lus la yang 'jug par gyis shig /sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal pa/ /su mu su mu/ su mu su mu su mu/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu rU ri ti/ ri ri ri ri ri ri/ rI rI rI rI rI rI ti/ mi ri mi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ mi ri/ mi rI ti/ ha si mi mi/ rI ti/ sI si mi/ kang+ka rA/ ka ra ka ta/ ka ra ka ra ka ra/ ka tsa/ kang+ka rA/ kang+ka rA/ kang+ka rA/ kang+ka rA/ kang+ka rA/ kang+ka rA/ kang+ka rA/ kang+ka rA/ kang+ka rA/ kang+ka rA/ kang+ka rA/ kang+ka rA/ kang+ka RA/ kang+ka ro tI ti/ ku ri sho/ kang+ka rA/ kang+ka rI/ shi ri ri ri ri ri ri ri rI te/ ri phu swA/ ri phu ri phu/ ri phu ri phu/ ri phu ri phu/ ri phu/ nA thA/ nA nA thA/ ri pU ri pU/ na thA thA/ nirgats+tsha ta/ ri bu ri pu/ nirgats+tsha ta/ pa la yA tra/ ri bu ri pu/ pa la yA tra/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can sems can thams cad la phan par lhag par

519
102-260a dgongs pa dang ldan pa byams pa la gnas pa/ thugs rje dang ldan pa/ dga' ba la gnas pa/ btang snyoms la gnas pa gshegs kyis k+Shi phran ni rgats+tsha ta swA hA/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi mchog dang / chos nyid kyis lha thams cad dang / 'byung po thams cad la bka' stsal pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni grub pa'o/ /tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag ni grub pa'o/ /gang la ser sna rnam chags pa/ /rnam bcom dri ma med mdzad cing / /thugs zhi gnod pa mi mnga' de/ /khyod la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams/ /thar pa'i lam du 'jud mdzad cing / /chos rnams thams cad ston pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /ston pa rgyug pa rnams kyi rten/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /gang gis bde ba mnga' mdzad de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /skyob pa gang zhig byams pa yi/ /thugs kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun/ /bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs te/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba yi/ /sems can kun gyi rten gyur cing / /gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur/ /gtsang zhing slu ba mi mnga' la/ /gsung gtsang gtsang mar mdzad pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /dpal bo chen po gang skyes pa/ /phun sum tshogs don 'byor gyur cing / /don grub tshogs kyang grub pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig skyes pas sa rnams ni/ /nags tshal bcas par rab g.yos shing / /sems can thams cad rab dga' de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /byang chub snying por gang zhig gis/ /sa dag rnam drug g.yos gyur cing / /bdud yid mi bder gyur pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnam gsung dang / /thub pa'i snyan pa gang byung

520
102-260b de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /yid 'phrog gang gis mu stegs byed/ /thams cad chos kyis pham mdzad cing / /tshogs kun dbang du mdzad pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas khyed la bde legs mdzad/ /brgya byin bcas lha bde legs mdzad/ /'byung po kun gyi bde legs ni/ /khyed la rtag tu sbyin gyur cig /sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang / /lha rnams kyis ni bsams pa yi/ /khyed kyi don 'dod gang yin pa/ /don de de ring grub gyur cig /rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog /rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs gyur/ /khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs shog /phyir ldog dag kyang bde gyur cig /nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs/ /nyi ma'i gung la'ang bde legs shing / /khyed cag kun tu bde legs shog /khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig /sangs rgyas lha rnams stong dag gis/ /yongs su bskor te gshegs mdzad kyis/ /sdang sems ldan pa rnams byer cig /snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khod/ /sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / /dgra bcom slob pa'i bden tshig gis/ /'jig rten mi phan byed pa rnams/ /grong khyer 'dir ni gtong gyur cig /sems can kun dang srog chags kun/ /'byung po kun dang khyed cag kun/ /bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig /thams cad nad rnams med par shog /kun gyis bzang rnams mthong gyur cig /gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig /'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur cing / /sa dang bar snang dag la gnas pa rnams/ /skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog /nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig /'phags pa yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i mdo chen po rdzogs s+ho// //paN+Di ta su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //
